class Gridsettings

Code files:

  • griddlg.cpp

Description:

    Class griddlg.cpp. This class is used to show a gridsettings dialog, in which the grid spacing, gridcolour, and backgroundcolour can be given.

Inherited from:

  • wxFrame (class) (public, standard)
